rooms.description: Traditional Kerala kitchen with an open layout and modern amenities integrated within a traditional setting. Adheres to Vastu principles by orienting the cooking area towards the east for positive energy.
rooms.vastu_notes: Feng Shui optimized by placing water elements away from main entrances.

rooms.description: Spacious living room with ample natural light and ventilation. Decorated with traditional Kerala woodwork and stone accents. The layout is designed to ensure a flow of energy in accordance with Vastu principles.
rooms.vastu_notes: The main entrance leads directly to the living area ensuring positive energy circulation.

rooms.description: Cozy bedroom featuring traditional Kerala-style wood carvings and natural lighting. Positioned on the north side as per Vastu guidelines for calm energy.
rooms.vastu_notes: North facing bedroom enhances calmness and balance.

rooms.description: Modern bathroom with traditional touches and efficient water flow, integrated with local Kerala design elements. The placement is optimized per Vastu principles for hygienic energy flow.
rooms.vastu_notes: The location ensures proper drainage and positive energy.

rooms.description: Dining area that seamlessly connects with the living room. Traditional Kerala motifs adorn the space along with an emphasis on communal eating spaces, in line with Vastu guidelines.
rooms.vastu_notes: Placed adjacent to the kitchen and living areas to encourage familial interaction.

rooms.description: Functional storage area designed for utility and ease of access. Adheres to local design norms with space-efficient planning.
rooms.vastu_notes: Positioned away from direct sunlight to preserve stored items.
